item.description:
Come experience the first full moon of the year. The first half of the evening will be a discussion on the importance of understanding and utilizing the energy body for one's physical, psychological, and spiritual development. The second half of the evening will be a meditation to bless the earth and use the added energy of the full moon for self-healing. A group energy healing will also be conducted during the meditation. To read more click here http://www.geneang.co...

Facilitated by Gene Ang
When: Sunday, January 11 from 7 to 9pm.
Where: The Enlightened Professional Center, 3 Barnard Lane, Bloomfield, CT 06002
Suggested contribution: $20
To reserve your place: call (203) 671-8047 or gene.ang@gmail.com
item.name: Full Moon Meditation
